title: Muppet Babies: Show and Tell
overview: Muppet Babies: Show and Tell is a short-form series featuring the Muppet characters from Disney Junior's Muppet Babies.Designed to promote the new Disney series and introduce the characters to audiences, the series premiered online with exclusive debuts of episodes on multiple websites on March 1, 2018 followed by a wider release online and airings on Disney Junior starting on March 2, 2018.In the shorts, viewers "get to know the Muppet Babies and their environment."
